DEVICE_RPK_RUN.description: The run button for an application

DEVICE_RPK_STOP.description: The stop button for an application

DEVICE_RPK_TASK_MANAGER.description: The button for the task manager

DEVICE_RPK_PACKAGE_MANAGER.description: The button for the package manager

DEVICE_RPK_NETWORK_MANAGER.description: The button for the network manager

DEVICE_RPK_DISCONNECT.description: The disconnect option in the disconnect menu

DEVICE_RPK_RESTART.description: The reboot and disconnect option in the disconnect menu

DEVICE_RPK_TURNOFF.description: The power off and disconnect option in the disconnect menu

DEVICE_FLASH_JAVASCRIPT.description: The flash javascript button for an application

DEVICE_RPK_STANDBY.description: The stand-by option in the disconnect menu.

DEVICE_RPK_ANOTHER_USER.message: L'appareil est déjà connecté à un autre utilisateur.
DEVICE_RPK_ANOTHER_USER.description: The notification message when another use is connected to the board and the board is busy

DEVICE_RPK_ERROR_BLE.description: The error shown when list devices for ble fails

DEVICE_RPK_FLASHING_IN_PROGRESS_PLEASE_W.description: Notification text while the binary is written on the RPK.

DEVICE_RPK_TOO_LONG_SOURCE_CODE.message: Le nombre de caractères du code source doit être inférieur à X.
DEVICE_RPK_TOO_LONG_SOURCE_CODE.description: Error shown when source code is bigger than the RPK supports.

DEVICE_RPK_FLASH_DONE.message: Écriture finalisée. L'appareil redémarre et se déconnecte automatiquement. Mettez l'appareil en mode DFU pour écrire le programme de nouveau.
DEVICE_RPK_FLASH_DONE.description: Notification shown when flashing is done.
